scripts.deploy-from-ci: node-lambda deploy -a $AWS_DEPLOY_USER_ACCESS_KEY -s $AWS_DEPLOY_USER_SECRET_KEY --role arn:aws:iam::810905322061:role/lambda_kinesis_role -e $DEPLOYMENT_ENV -d 'Processes motion detected events from Kinesis stream (Travis build: $TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER, Commit id: $TRAVIS_COMMIT)' --configFile deploy.env
